name: Moonstone
tagline: Platform for analysis, processing and visualization of medical images (DICOM).
body:
What is Moonstone?

Moonstone is a platform for analysis, processing and visualization of medical images (DICOM). It is multiplatform (Unix-like, Mac OSX, Windows) written in Python and distributed on a free license (LGPL).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
